title: Northpoint City - Family-Friendly Shopping Mall
blurb: A family-friendly shopping mall in Yishun, Singapore.
description: Northpoint City is a large shopping mall in Yishun, offering a variety of retail, dining, and entertainment options suitable for families. The mall features a wide range of stores, including fashion, electronics, and home goods, as well as numerous restaurants and cafes. It provides a convenient and enjoyable shopping experience for families with children, with amenities such as nursing rooms and play areas. The mall also hosts various events and promotions throughout the year, making it a vibrant destination for the community. Northpoint City aims to cater to the diverse needs of families.
full_address: Northpoint City 930 Yishun Avenue 2 Singapore 769098 (65) 6754 2300 Get Directions Customer Service Counter North Wing, Level 2 Opening Hours: 10am to 10pm Redemption Hours: 10am to 9

title: Northpoint City - Family Friendly Destination
blurb: Your family fun starts here at Northpoint City!
description: Northpoint City offers a variety of family-friendly amenities and activities. Explore a wide range of retail options, dining experiences, and entertainment suitable for all ages. With dedicated play areas and convenient facilities, Northpoint City ensures a comfortable and enjoyable experience for families. Discover something new and exciting for every member of the family at Northpoint City. Enjoy quality time together in a vibrant and welcoming environment. From shopping to dining and entertainment, Northpoint City is the perfect destination for a memorable family outing.

title: Northpoint City Family Activities and Amenities
blurb: Explore family-friendly stores and amenities at Northpoint.
description: Northpoint City offers a variety of family-friendly stores and amenities designed to cater to the needs of parents and children. From retail outlets to dining options, families can find everything they need for a convenient and enjoyable shopping experience. Explore the different stores and amenities available to make the most of your visit. Discover play areas and kid-friendly dining options for a fun day out with the family. Enjoy a seamless experience with facilities designed for families.

title: Northpoint City Family Fun and Play Arena Venues
blurb: Discover family-friendly venues at Northpoint City.
description: Northpoint City offers a variety of family-friendly venues and play areas designed to entertain and engage children of all ages. From indoor playgrounds to interactive activity zones, there's something for every family to enjoy. Explore the different levels of the mall to find dedicated spaces where kids can play, learn, and have fun in a safe and stimulating environment. These venues provide a perfect opportunity for families to spend quality time together, creating lasting memories through play and exploration. Discover the joy of family bonding at Northpoint City's diverse range of kid-friendly attractions and amenities.

title: Northpoint City Family-Friendly Amenities Overview
blurb: Explore family-friendly amenities at Northpoint City.
description: Northpoint City offers a range of amenities designed for families, including baby seats in toilet cubicles, diaper changing stations, family parking lots, family/nursing rooms, potty seats in toilet, and water refill stations. These facilities ensure a comfortable and convenient experience for parents and children visiting the mall. Enjoy a hassle-free shopping and dining experience with these thoughtful provisions catering to your family's needs. The mall strives to provide a welcoming environment for all families.

title: Northpoint City Family Activities and Services
description: Northpoint City offers a variety of family-friendly activities and services to cater to the needs of parents and children. Explore the mall's offerings, including play areas, kids-friendly dining options, and various retail stores suitable for families. Enjoy a convenient and enjoyable shopping experience with amenities designed to make family outings easier and more fun. Discover a range of services and facilities designed to enhance your family's experience at Northpoint City, ensuring a memorable visit for everyone. From dedicated family parking spaces to nursing rooms, the mall provides essential amenities for parents with young children. Explore the diverse range of retail stores offering children's apparel, toys, and educational products, catering to the needs of families with kids of all ages.
